All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Controller
Main controller for the application's navigation and menu management.
FeedbackController
Controller for feedback modal windows (correct/incorrect responses).
Game
Main game class that manages the game state, player, and game flow.
GameController
Main game controller that manages the gameplay logic, user input, and UI updates.
GameRules
Manages game rules and validation logic for the typing game.
GameTimer
Manages the game timer for each level with decreasing time based on difficulty.
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the typing game.
IWordProvider
Interface for providing words and phrases to the typing game.
Main
Main application class for the Fast Typing Game.
Player
Represents a player in the typing game with score tracking and level completion statistics.
ResultsController
Controller for the game results screen.
WordProviderImplementation
Implementation of IWordProvider that provides Spanish words and phrases for different difficulty levels in the typing game.
